title: Jazz2Online reopens!
content:
In case anyone in here still is interested in what's going on the "other" platformer community. Our main website, [url=http://www.jazz2online.com/]www.jazz2online.com/[/url] has been completely rewritten. Read some about the game, characters and levels. Or look through our extensive downloads section, and perhaps upload a level yourself.

I stop my shameless advert here [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img]
